column5: Very close to the big game! Nice, quiet neighborhood. Walking distance from downtown!  Close to many restaurants & popular after hour events  Replies very quickly for any questions or help!  Ubers & cabs are very popular & frequent in this area  My beautiful place is 6 miles from the NRG Stadium! 12 minutes away. My place is also located 2minutes from Downtown Houston & Discovery Green where many events will be taking place, free concerts etc! Hope this helps add to your fun:-)   P.S. Staying longer than one day/night is perfectly fine. Just let me know!
